word_mean: 自体受精：同一个体雄性配子和雌性配子的融合

sentence.Network_en: Self - pollination, and subsequently self - fertilization, in orchards always takes place to some extent.
sentence.Network_cn: 在果园中,常常有某种程度的自花传粉和随后地自花授精.

sentence.Network_en: Inbreeders are plants which predominantly or wholly produce seeds from self - fertilization.
sentence.Network_cn: 近交植物指主要地或完全地通过自在受精产生种子的植物.

sentence.Network_en: In order to obtain factual information about self - fertilization, empirical measurements must be made.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了得到关于自传花粉的确实资料, 必须采用一些已行之有效的方法.
